GameConditionDef.label: psychic storm
GameConditionDef.description: Threatened anima forest released a psychic scream strong enough to enchant the very particles of water in the atmosphere. A short but incredibly powerful supernatural rain has begun, altering the very composition of time. Any person or creature not under roof will age years within mere hours. It is expected to last several hours.
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The worst of the psychic storm has settled.

GameConditionDef.label: Psychic flare
GameConditionDef.description: Sensing your actions and ill-intentions, anima forest changed the composition of matter around the forest, disabling all electronic devices for the foreseeable future.

GameConditionDef.label: Anima soothe
GameConditionDef.description: A distant archotech is emitting psychic signals through an orbital amplifier, calming people and stabilizing their minds.
GameConditionDef.letterText: In order to reward you for living in harmony with the forest, anima forest released a smooth psychic soothe, making your colonists euphoric.
